Title: Simulating worlds on the GPU
Description: This post delves into the implementation of my procedural earth simulation, written entirely in GLSL fragment shaders. It simulates the complete history of an earth-like planet in a few minutes, with the simulation updating at 60 frames per second.

Title: The Assange Case Is Collapsing – But it Remains a Travesty of Justice
Description: Last month, a key witness against Julian Assange admitted that his testimony was false. It's further proof that this case has little to do with justice – but is a persecution designed to silence critical journalists.
